name: The Eternal Shooter
description:
The game that never stops growing!

This game continues to evolve into whatever its players request. You can help shape the game into what you want to play.

Feel free to request new features, improvements, content, or whatever your want. Wherever this game goes next is down to you!

If you have any feedback or suggestions on what you would like to see, please contact us at: NicholasDeanApps@gmail.com
